document.full_text: saudi arabia sent troops into bahrain on monday to help calm weeks of protests by the shi'ite muslim majority, a move opponents of the sunni ruling family on the island called a declaration of war.
document.title: saudi sends troops, bahrain shi'ites call it "war"
lines_and_colors: saudi arabia sent troops into bahrain on monday to help calm weeks of protests by the shi'ite muslim majority, a move opponents of the sunni ruling family on the island called a declaration of war.
